title: Strengthening Instructional Method Practical Competencies: Ontology-Based Personalized Mathematics Learning Environment Design

context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can design personalized learning pathways by connecting mathematical concepts (CogSkillNet) with cognitive functions (ConceptNet).
Learners can improve problem-solving strategies by over 80% using navigation feedback provided by an ontology-based system.
By the end of the 4-week course, learners can establish self-directed learning plans using a mathematical cognitive function visualization tool.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
